content: --ज्ञ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} knowing places. {2} clever, dexterous. (--ज्ञः {1} the soul; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Bg. 13. 1</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 13.">3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 12.</ls> {2} the supreme soul. {3} a libertine. {4} a husbandman. {5} a form of Śiva. {6} a witness. (--ज्ञा a girl fifteen years old personating Durgā at a festival.
